original: 潁川潁陰人，荀彧手足。初效力於韓馥，之後勸說韓馥讓冀州牧予袁紹，而得袁紹徵辟，出任謀士。在官渡之戰後，史冊上再無其人相關記述。
text: Yingchuan Yingyin people, Xunyu siblings. He first played for Han Fu, and later persuaded Han Fu to let Jizhou pasture Yuan Shao, and Yuan Shao was appointed as a counselor. After the Battle of Guandu, there is no more related account of him in the history books.
